title: Rewards Guardian

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Rewards Guardian is a rift guardian found outside the barrier in the Temple of the Eye. Players can search the guardian's rift to receive their rewards after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift.

content:
This article is about the guardian from Guardians of the Rift. For the guardian from the Mage Training Arena, see Rewards Guardian (Mage Training Arena).
Rewards Guardian
Released23 March 2022 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationTemple of the Eye
OptionsSearch, Check
ExamineMight be something good inside that rift...
Map
Advanced data
Object ID43695

The Rewards Guardian is a rift guardian found outside the barrier in the Temple of the Eye. Players can search the guardian's rift to receive their rewards after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift.

One elemental and catalytic point are needed to search the Rewards Guardian. At the end of a game, one point is given for every 100 energy gained, with a chance of rounding up (ex. 73 catalytic energy will give a 73% chance of gaining one catalytic point); the game chat will display how much of each the player has earned, as well as their total points.

The "Check" option on the Rewards Guardian will also show the total amount of points the player has, as well as the total amount of times they've searched them for rewards.

Rewards from the rift include runes, talismans, and various unique rewards. Abyssal pearls can only be obtained from this minigame and are used to purchase items from the Temple Supplies shop, which include the Raiments of the Eye and Ring of the elements.

The average number of Abyssal pearls per search is 2.14[1], thus making 630 the average number of searches required to complete the full Raiments of the Eye set.[2]

The average Rewards Guardian search is worth 6,013.67.
